content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]OculoCam® System for cost-effective slit lamp imaging. Works with a smartphone or point-and-shoot digital camera and can connect to either the ocular or the alignment post.

  • Cost-effective solution for slit lamp photography
  • Attachments for both digital cameras and smartphones
  • Options to mount on eyepiece or slitlamp alignment post
  • Hard carrying case which includes mount for external adapter
  • Adapters available individually or as part of a kit

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72298″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1571865682017{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Oculocam System

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Invented by Dr. John Graether, the OculoCam® system is the most cost-effective option we carry to capture images on an ophthalmic slit lamp. The interchangeable mounts allow it to either stick to a smartphone or connect a digital camera using the tripod attachment.

This system can work by either clamping around the slitlamp eyepiece and lining up with the phone or camera for close-up shots, or by connecting to the slit lamp alignment post for external photography. The parts can be purchased individually, or as a complete kit with a carrying case.

Part # 8100SP-Kit & 8100DC-Kit

US Patent Nos 7,922,329B1 and 9,131,132B2[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54e695-fa41″][vc_column_text]

Compatible with almost every smartphone and digital camera.

Compatible with 66 Vision Tech, Appasamy, Burton, Haag-Streit, Keeler, Knosla, Marco, Nidek, Shin Nippon, Takagi, Topcon, Veatch, Woodlyn, Rodenstock, Reichert, Zeiss, and other slit lamps.

Haag-Streit Disclaimer

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3de695-fa41″][vc_column_text]

The OculoCam® digital imaging kit is a class 1 device, and is approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014ae695-fa41″][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
